short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: convert Georgian to Latin alphabet character, simple for easy reading/learning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change Georgian letters to Latin letters, on website.
This extension automatically converts Georgian letters to the corresponding letters in the Latin alphabet.

This should be helpful for learning, reading. for studying Georgian language.
